verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, that ye might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither ye <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it:

That thou mightest <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee, thou, and thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>; and that thy <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged<s%>.

¶ <S%H8085>Hear<s%> therefore, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it; that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and that ye may <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H3966>mightily<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee, in the <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:
And thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with all thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and with all thy <S%H3966>might<s%>.
And these <S%H1697>words<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, shall be in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>:

And thou shalt teach them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, and shalt <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and when thou <S%H3212>walkest<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and when thou liest <S%H7901>down<s%>, and when thou risest <S%H6965>up<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> upon thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall be as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and on thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

And it shall be, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which thou <S%H1129>buildedst<s%> not,

And <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of all <S%H2898>good<s%> things, which thou <S%H4390>filledst<s%> not, and <S%H953>wells<s%> <S%H2672>digged<s%>, which thou <S%H2672>diggedst<s%> not, <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and olive <S%H2132>trees<s%>, which thou <S%H5193>plantedst<s%> not; when thou shalt have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and be <S%H7646>full<s%>;

Then <S%H8104>beware<s%> lest thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and shalt <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> which are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you;

(For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you) lest the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against thee, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thee from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
¶ Ye shall not <S%H5254>tempt<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as ye <S%H5254>tempted<s%> him in <S%H4532>Massah<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, which he hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and that thou mayest go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>,
To cast <S%H1920>out<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And when thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asketh<s%> thee in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What mean the <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you?

Then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, We were <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>shewed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>sore<s%>, upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon all his <S%H1004>household<s%>, before our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>:
And he brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from thence, that he might bring us <S%H935>in<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, for our <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>, that he might preserve us <S%H2421>alive<s%>, as it is at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And it shall be our <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, if we <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, as he hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.
